name: The Void of Space (Scary)
description:
Modifications

- I created a custom Skybox for the game using Photoshop

- I created a death box so that one can fall into the void and die there.

- I recorded custom voice lines for all relevant sound effects in the game.

- I created a custom version of level 1 to showcase some fun platforming dynamics and the death box.

Designed by Daniel Cervera-Holman
